# applicationBundle

**Type Property**

A type that represents a bundled app.

## Declaration

```swift
static var applicationBundle: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `com.apple.application-bundle`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeApplication], [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeBundle], and [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypePackage].

## Apple system types

- **framework**: A type that represents an Apple framework bundle.
- **applicationExtension**: A type that represents an app extension.
- **spotlightImporter**: A type that represents a Spotlight metadata importer bundle.
- **quickLookGenerator**: A type that represents a QuickLook preview generator bundle.
- **xpcService**: A type that represents an XPC service bundle.
- **systemPreferencesPane**: A type that represents a System Preferences pane.
